item.title: Weak Credit Growth And Rate Cuts to Squeeze Profit at India’s HDFC, ICICI Banks
item.description: India’s top private-sector banks HDFC Bank Ltd. and ICICI Bank Ltd. could see profits come under pressure from loan growth at a three-year low and thinning margins driven by central bank rate cuts, as

item.title: HDFC Bank Shares Rise as Lender Mulls First-Ever Bonus Issue
item.description: HDFC Bank Ltd.’s stock advanced on Wednesday after India’s largest private-sector lender said it is considering an issue of bonus shares for the first time.

item.title: HDFC Bank Shares Rise as Lender Mulls First-Ever Bonus Issue
item.description: HDFC Bank Ltd.’s stock advanced on Wednesday after India’s largest private-sector lender said it is considering an issue of bonus shares for the first time.

item.title: HDFC Bank’s Board to Consider Issue of Bonus Shares on July 19
item.description: HDFC Bank Ltd. said it will consider a bonus issue of shares on July 19, when the country’s largest private sector lender is scheduled to announce its quarterly earnings.
